content:
I'm glad to hear that you had a great time volunteering at the food drive!

However, I'm a large language model, I don't have personal knowledge or access to your personal schedule or activities. I'm a new conversation each time you interact with me, so I don't retain any information about your past conversations or activities.

But I can suggest a few ways to help you remember where you attended Sunday mass on March 12th:

1. Check your calendar: Look at your physical or digital calendar to see if you wrote down the location of the mass you attended.
2. Ask a friend or family member: If you attended mass with someone else, ask them if they remember where you went.
3. Check your church's website: If you're a regular attendee at a particular church, check their website to see if they have a schedule or calendar that lists the masses they held on March 12th.
4. Look for receipts or reminders: Check your email or physical receipts to see if you have any reminders or confirmations about attending mass on that date.

I hope these suggestions help you remember where you attended Sunday mass on March 12th!
